item.title: ASEAN releases strategic plan for the development of small and medium enterprises
item.description: Source: ASEAN Secretariat. The ASEAN Strategic Action Plan for SME Development (SAPSMED) 2016-2025 acknowledges the significant role of micro, small, and medium-sized enterprises (MSMEs) in ASEAN’s economic growth, job creation, and women’s empowerment. The plan seeks to enhance MSME participation in an increasingly competitive market and support their expansion and progress. This plan outlines an implementation roadmap utilizing country representatives, leveraging available resources, including those from ASEAN Dialogue Partners, and incorporating regular monitoring and evaluation.
